leading-none.description: Used for buttons, input fields etc.

leading-tight.description: Used for display and large titles

leading-normal.description: Used for body copy and smaller titles

leading-9,5.description: Used for text 3xl, mobile text 4xl (size: 32, line-height: 120%)

leading-8.description: Used for mobile text lg (size: 20, line-height: 150%)

leading-4.description: Used for text base compact (size: 16, line-height: 100%)

leading-8,5.description: Used for text xl, mobile text 3xl (size: 28, line-height: 120%)

leading-3.description: Used for text sm compact (size: 14, line-height: 100%)

400.description: grey-400

3.description: Used for text sm compact (size: 14, line-height: 100%)

4.description: Used for text base compact (size: 16, line-height: 100%)

8.description: Used for mobile text lg (size: 20, line-height: 150%)

8,5.description: Used for text xl, mobile text 3xl (size: 28, line-height: 120%)

9,5.description: Used for text 3xl, mobile text 4xl (size: 32, line-height: 120%)

4,5.description: Used for text base compact (size: 16, line-height: 100%)

200.description: color has same luminance as step 100

400.description: color has same luminance as step 100

3.description: Used for text sm compact (size: 14, line-height: 100%)

4.description: Used for text base compact (size: 16, line-height: 100%)

8.description: Used for mobile text lg (size: 20, line-height: 150%)

4,5.description: Used for text base compact (size: 16, line-height: 100%)

8,5.description: Used for text xl, mobile text 3xl (size: 28, line-height: 120%)

9,5.description: Used for text 3xl, mobile text 4xl (size: 32, line-height: 120%)

fast.description:
Component State
Animation of states like hover or pressed
Microinteractions
Smooth transitions eg. for buttons or dropdowns

medium.description:
Component State
Animation of states like hover or pressed
Microinteractions
Smooth transitions eg. for buttons or dropdowns

slow.description:
Component State
Animation of states like hover or pressed
Microinteractions
Smooth transitions eg. for buttons or dropdowns

x-slow.description:
Page and component transitions
Transitions between screens, building animations for bigger components. (eg. image-text, super-teaser)
